p: The fraction obtained from column chromatography showing single band on TLC (Fig. 4) was subjected to HPLC and further analysed for GC–MS which revealed the presence of various compounds with corresponding peaks at different retention times (Fig. 5). Thirty compounds were detected in GC–MS, out of which five were the major compounds namely phenol, 2,4 bis (1,1dimethylethyl); E-14-hexadecenal; 10-heneicosene (c,t); 3- eicosene and 1-heneicosanol (Table 3).
